text: Burma competed in the Summer Olympic Games for the first time at the 1948 Summer Olympics in London, England. ==Athletics== ;Men ;Track & road events {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Quarterfinal !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |- style="font-size:95%" !Result !Rank !Result !Rank !Result !Rank !Result !Rank |- align=center |align=left rowspan=2|Maung Sein Pe |align=left|100 m |11.68 |6 |colspan=6 |Did not advance |- align=center |align=left|200 m |NT |4 |colspan=6 |Did not advance |} ==Boxing== ;Men {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !1 Round !2 Round !Quarterfinals !Semifinals !colspan=2|Final |- style="font-size:95%" !Opposition Result !Opposition Result !Opposition Result !Opposition Result !Opposition Result !Rank |- align=center |align=left|Maung Myo Thant |align=left|Flyweight | W PTS | L RSC-3 |colspan=5|Did not advance |- align=center |align=left|Hardy Saw |align=left|Bantamweight | L RSC2 |colspan=5|Did not advance |} ==Weightlifting== ;Men {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Military press !colspan="2"|Snatch !colspan="2"|Clean & Jerk !rowspan="2"|Total !rowspan="2"|Rank |- style="font- size:95%" !Result !Rank !Result !Rank !Result !Rank |- align=center |- align=center |align=left|Maung Win Maung | style="text-align:left;"|56 kg |82.5 |5 |82.5 |12 |100.0 |15 |265.0 |15 |} ==References== *Official Olympic Reports Category:Nations at the 1948 Summer Olympics 1948 Olympics
